q: that seemed to holler to all their doubters, ''Take that!'' ''We just wanted to show the whole world we could play together,'' Carmelo Anthony said after the duo's triumphant debut Monday night. We know there's a lot of doubt about that. Carmelo Anthony scored 28 points in his return from a 15-game suspension for fighting and Allen Iverson added 23 in the Denver Nuggets' 115-98 rout of the Memphis Grizzlies. The two are out to prove two superstars can coexist.

Robin Williams calls this group the brotherhood of the cracked chest club. Interviews with Robin Williams , Bill Clinton , David Letterman , Regis Philbin and Charlie Rose reveal very different men and their paths to near total heart disease and recovery. The side effects are often as emotionally draining as physically debilitating.

Mr David Cameron said in a statement: I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. I wish Andy Coulson all the very best for his future, which I am certain will be a successful one. Last week Mr David Cameron refused to confirm or deny reports that Mr Andy Coulson had offered to resign to spare the Government further damage.
